titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 698) to regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 698) to regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. McBath. Petition No: 118-2.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 698) to regulate assault weapons, to ensure that the right to keep and bear arms is not unlimited.
